MemoryInfobox.description: 'The Phila|Tempest sent two mercenary|mercenaries to patrol Boura in search of the Kassandra|Eagle Bearer. But facing two mercenaries at the same time was a challenge from which Kassandra would not back down.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' – 'Legacy of the First Blade: Shadow Heritage'
MemoryInfobox.next: Proktos the Moon King (memory)|Proktos the Moon King

General_Description: '''Kephalon the Thinker''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra tracked down [[Kephalon the Thinker]], one of the [[Mercenary|mercenaries]] sent by the [[Phila|Tempest]] to eliminate her.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra travelled to the [[Boura]], finding Kephalon along with [[Proktos the Moon King]]. Kephalon spotted Kassandra and attacked her.
*'''Mercenary:''' ''Your death will bring me great fortune, Eagle Bearer. I'll name my new villa after you.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Too bad you'll never see it.''
Kassandra defeated Kephalon.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and eliminated [[Kephalon the Thinker]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]'' – ''[[Legacy of the First Blade: Shadow Heritage]]''
